alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:29PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Benton and east central Carroll Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1128 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bruceton, or 11 miles southwest of Camden, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camden, Bruceton, Hollow Rock, Dollar, Garretsburg, Buena Vista and Nathan Bedford Forrest State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for west Tennessee.
